about_the_game:
About This Game

In the year 2051 AD, humanity is finally doomed.
With no cure for environmental pollution.

In this hopeless world where the last of us loot and kill each other, I must survive.

For my family, who I firmly believe will still be alive.

"My eyes are the eyes of the victim, my hands are the hands of the perpetrator"

About This Game

THE LAST BREATH is a game that survives the post-apocalypse worldview caused by air pollution.

Aim to farm resources and survive to avoid looters. You shouldn't trust anyone but yourself.

Supports single play or online play for 1 to 5 people
Combat functionality using guns/swords is also included.

Controls

This game can be moved to the W, A, S, and D keys, and you can check your current situation, inventory, etc. with the E key.
Interaction is possible with F key, and the game can be suspended for a while with ESC.

Other detailed controls can be guided in the game.

Requirements

THE LAST BREATH is supported on PCs using the latest DirectX 12 driver with Shader Model 6 (SM6).

NVIDIA: Maxwell Generation Card or higher
AMD: GCN Generation Card and Above

All versions of Windows 10 and later with DirectX 12 Agility SDK support (version 1909.1350 and later) and Windows 11 are supported.
▶ It is theoretically viable in Linux, Windows 7, or 8 environments, but testing is not yet. Is the same as a 32-bit computer.

Also, The developer's computer performance is I5-10400F & RTX3060.
The average FPS in the graphic setting "Ultra" is 144.

The recommended graphic settings specification is "Medium".

The minimum specification for this game is GTX 1060 3GB or higher, but you can use Afterburner such as GTX 1050TI, GTX 960, you can to meet the minimum specification with overclocking.
Other Guidance

Due to the nature of the game, the quality of "EFFECT", "SHADING", and "FOLIAGE" in the graphic setting is fixed to the "Medium" setting.
The "SHADING" setting and the "SHADOW" setting are completely different settings.

Thank you!
detailed_description:
About This Game

In the year 2051 AD, humanity is finally doomed.
With no cure for environmental pollution.

In this hopeless world where the last of us loot and kill each other, I must survive.

For my family, who I firmly believe will still be alive.

"My eyes are the eyes of the victim, my hands are the hands of the perpetrator"

About This Game

THE LAST BREATH is a game that survives the post-apocalypse worldview caused by air pollution.

Aim to farm resources and survive to avoid looters. You shouldn't trust anyone but yourself.

Supports single play or online play for 1 to 5 people
Combat functionality using guns/swords is also included.

Controls

This game can be moved to the W, A, S, and D keys, and you can check your current situation, inventory, etc. with the E key.
Interaction is possible with F key, and the game can be suspended for a while with ESC.

Other detailed controls can be guided in the game.

Requirements

THE LAST BREATH is supported on PCs using the latest DirectX 12 driver with Shader Model 6 (SM6).

NVIDIA: Maxwell Generation Card or higher
AMD: GCN Generation Card and Above

All versions of Windows 10 and later with DirectX 12 Agility SDK support (version 1909.1350 and later) and Windows 11 are supported.
▶ It is theoretically viable in Linux, Windows 7, or 8 environments, but testing is not yet. Is the same as a 32-bit computer.

Also, The developer's computer performance is I5-10400F & RTX3060.
The average FPS in the graphic setting "Ultra" is 144.

The recommended graphic settings specification is "Medium".

The minimum specification for this game is GTX 1060 3GB or higher, but you can use Afterburner such as GTX 1050TI, GTX 960, you can to meet the minimum specification with overclocking.
Other Guidance

Due to the nature of the game, the quality of "EFFECT", "SHADING", and "FOLIAGE" in the graphic setting is fixed to the "Medium" setting.
The "SHADING" setting and the "SHADOW" setting are completely different settings.

Thank you!
name: THE LAST BREATH

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: I5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: I5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek

short_description: Survive the post-apocalypse world. There's a predator who's going after you. This is Online and local party games enjoyed by 1 to 5 players. you have to Survive in an end-of-life world.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, French, German, Simplified Chinese, Russian
*languages with full audio support
